MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8:57am in the SY15 and SY16 Aberbechan, Abermule and Montgomery areas of Newtown following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 11:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:58am on 27th November 2020.
